sentences.displayText: Welcome to the conceptual design meeting.
I'll again be the secretary and make minutes, take minutes, and it will be three presentations, just like the last meeting.
So who wants to start off?
Before we begin it, I want to say I've put the minutes of the second meeting in the shared folder, but they're still not quite okay.
It still some technical difficulties so the first part of the minutes are very hard to read, because there are two documents that were layered over each other.
But from now on I won't use my pen anymore, so will be just ordinary keyboard.
I think it will be more easy for you to read the minutes.
Okay, when we talk about components design, it's really about the material and really the stuff we build the remote controls of.
A remote control consist of components and the components of a remote control consist of properties and material.
We have to choose these wisely and it could affect a kind of in in buying the remote controls.
The components of a remote control are of course the case.
The properties of the case, it has to be solid in hard material like hard plastic with soft rubber for falling and it feels good in your hand.
Mm the buttons has to be solid too, and the material is soft rubber.
I've got a email from the possibilities of Real Reaction.
They're telling me that when we build a remote control of plastic or rubber, the buttons have to be rubber too.

When we use a rubbled a doubled curved case, we must use a rubber push-buttons to the rubber double-curved case is a three-dimensional curve in the design, which is necessary when we want to be trendy.
The energy source, I've got a lot of possibilities for that too.
The basic battery, which I prefer because of its non non-depending of of here you have to have a hand kinetic energy.
Also in this one, in the watches, a remote control can lie on a table for a day, and then you push a button and so you don't have to walk with it all the time.
Mm, solar cells are also a bit weird for remote controls.
Also the case material, I think that plastic is the best with rubber, because wood or titanium would also be a bit weird.
Titanium is probably trendy, I think.
They don't tell anything about the cost of titanium.
The chip set and the board is all off the shelf.
Also, the speaker in the remote control, when we want to retrieve it.
The base station is also off the shelf, all the materials and the components are just available in our factory.
